channel.title: Sunlightscape 317 Claws, All skills, pk & eco
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
Today is the official release of sunlightscape!
Looking for mods/admins!
ALL SKILLS + PK SKILL!
Features - Dicing - Pm logs - Chat logs - Commands logs - Vote store - Curse prayer - Donator island - All Tzhaar waves - Custom quest tab - Bank slots fixed - Vote4Cash system - Money pouch fixed - Dupes fixed - 317 Gameframe fixed - Multiple custom item - Custom ranks + crowns - Clan chat + Lootshare - Donator Credits system - Ingame item spawner GUI - Staff interface options - Created summoning system - Perfect skillcape emotes - All 25 skill work perfectly - Perfect combat + perfect PVP - Dungeoneering & Pk'ing skills - Skillcape shop with no more lag - Quest cape require all stats 99 - Christmas craker system opening - Loyalty titles system color fixed - Donator cape gives 1.5x more experiences - Chests added
Minigames - Barrows - Duel arena - Tzhaar cave - Pest control - Warriors guild
Bosses - Godwars - Corporal beast - Dagannoth kings - Tormented demons - King black dragon
Forums: http://sunlightscape.forumotion.info/ Server is always on! (running on VPS!)
Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/gegt2peoa21puen/Sunlightscape%20client.zip?dl=1
PICS:
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2hfuhk2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2yuzznq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/rclv9l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2zz5739.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/10nxd7d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/voss41.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2z8u6n9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2evxmbq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/hthidy.png[/img]

item.title: Sunlightscape 317 Claws, All skills, pk & eco
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

maximebasque:

OMG what a noob. Well i’m the main creator of Acheron and you 100% leeched my server, just changed the name. First all links doesn’t work and secondly none will join if you don’t fix auto cache downloader lol. GG

To be honest, I wouldn’t admit to creating this garbage.

OT: Drop “scape” at the end of your name, it’s too long, sounds childish, and front page toplist servers tend to stray away from “scape,” good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Sunlightscape 317 Claws, All skills, pk & eco
item.dc:creator: @alik123 alik123
item.description:
@alik123 wrote:

[quote=“Islaynoobs, post:4, topic:547801”][quote author=alik123 link=topic=666706.msg4457760#msg4457760 date=1415889250]

OMG what a noob. Well i’m the main creator of Acheron and you 100% leeched my server, just changed the name. First all links doesn’t work and secondly none will join if you don’t fix auto cache downloader lol. GG
[/quote] Well I didn’t, I fixed your wrong spelled ‘developper’ and added and changed shops, and the auto cache downloader is fixed

And thats all? lmfao[/quote]

I haven’t done much as you say, but some dupes are fixed and the dzone will be refreshed, this server isn’t finished completely yet. Just some small things are left.

Read full topic

item.title: Sunlightscape 317 Claws, All skills, pk & eco
item.dc:creator: @alik123 alik123
item.description:
@alik123 wrote:

Hello Everyone,

Today is the official release of sunlightscape!

Looking for mods/admins!

ALL SKILLS + PK SKILL!

Features

  • Dicing
  • Pm logs
  • Chat logs
  • Commands logs
  • Vote store
  • Curse prayer
  • Donator island
  • All Tzhaar waves
  • Custom quest tab
  • Bank slots fixed
  • Vote4Cash system
  • Money pouch fixed
  • Dupes fixed
  • 317 Gameframe fixed
  • Multiple custom item
  • Custom ranks + crowns
  • Clan chat + Lootshare
  • Donator Credits system
  • Ingame item spawner GUI
  • Staff interface options
  • Created summoning system
  • Perfect skillcape emotes
  • All 25 skill work perfectly
  • Perfect combat + perfect PVP
  • Dungeoneering & Pk’ing skills
  • Skillcape shop with no more lag
  • Quest cape require all stats 99
  • Christmas craker system opening
  • Loyalty titles system color fixed
  • Donator cape gives 1.5x more experiences
  • Chests added

Minigames

  • Barrows
  • Duel arena
  • Tzhaar cave
  • Pest control
  • Warriors guild

Bosses

  • Godwars
  • Corporal beast
  • Dagannoth kings
  • Tormented demons
  • King black dragon

Forums: http://sunlightscape.forumotion.info/
Server is always on! (running on VPS!)

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/gegt2peoa21puen/Sunlightscape%20client.zip?dl=1
